MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-JAN-2021 11:12.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the  CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Albert Ave, Tir Digonedd and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.41am. Our engineers are on site to investigate the network fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15am.   We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.52am on the 16th of Jan 2021
